General.Name: Mrs. Bectors Food Specialities Limited
General.Description: Mrs. Bectors Food Specialities Limited manufactures and distributes various food products in India. It provides biscuits, including cookies, creams, crackers, digestives, marie, and glucose under the Mrs. Bector's Cremica brand. The company also manufactures and markets bakery products that comprise breads, buns, pizza bases, cakes, muffins, garlic bread, frozen products, processed and semi-processed dough-based products, as well as white, brown, specialty, Indian, western, sub, and artisanal bread/loaves under the English Oven brand. In addition, it exports its products to 63 countries. Mrs. Bectors Food Specialities Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Gurugram, India.
General.Address: Emaar Digital Greens - Tower A, Gurugram, India, 122102
